languages.text: "Через Администратум проходит бессчетное количество дел, но крошечная их часть нам неподвластна. Согласно договоренностям с династией, те тяжбы, что при любом решении влекут за собой тяжкие последствия, испокон веков рассматриваются Вольными Торговцами. Только ваша священная власть заставит стороны принять вердикт и не взбунтоваться. Мы оттягивали заседание сколько могли, но теперь обязаны передать дела".

traits.locale_text: "Эти дела касаются ваших подданных, а значит вы имеете право их судить. Мы только помогаем вам, как было оговорено с Леди Теодорой. Строго говоря, это традиция, формальность — новому главе династии было бы правильным закрепить союз с Администратумом и Арбитес, взойдя на трон судьи во Дворце Правосудия и рассудив несколько дел". {n}Старуха замолкает в почтительном ожидании вашего согласия. Вам становится очевидно, что столетние традиции династии не позволят вам ответить иначе.{/n}

languages.text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."
languages.original_text: "Через Администратум проходит бессчетное количество дел, но крошечная их часть нам неподвластна. languages.text: 「帝国行政局は実に無数の案件を裁いておりますが、ごくわずかながら、私たちの裁定権を超える事例も存在します。あなたの王朝との何世紀にもわたる契約に定められている通り、最終判断がいかなるものであれ、重大な結果を招くおそれのある争いについては、例外なくローグトレーダーによる審査が求められます。あなたの聖なる権威のみが、当事者に判決を受け入れさせ、反乱を防ぐことができるのです。私たちは可能な限り審理を引き延ばしてまいりましたが、今やこれらの案件をあなたに引き渡さねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."

「帝国行政局は実に無数の案件を裁いておりますが、ごくわずかながら、私たちの裁定権を超える事例も存在します。あなたの王朝との何世紀にもわたる契約に定められている通り、最終判断がいかなるものであれ、重大な結果を招くおそれのある争いについては、例外なくローグトレーダーによる審査が求められます。あなたの聖なる権威のみが、当事者に判決を受け入れさせ、反乱を防ぐことができるのです。私たちは可能な限り審理を引き延ばしてまいりましたが、今やこれらの案件をあなたに引き渡さねばなりません」

languages.text: "Es sind in der Tat zahllose Fälle, die das Administratum bearbeitet, aber eine sehr geringe Zahl davon können wir leider nicht abschließen. Wie in unserem jahrhundertelangen Pakt mit Eurer Dynastie festgeschrieben, sind ausnahmslos alle Streitigkeiten, die ernsthafte Konsequenzen nach sich ziehen könnten, unabhängig von der letztlichen Entscheidung {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} zu prüfen. Allein Eure heilige Autorität kann die Parteien zwingen, das Urteil zu akzeptieren, ohne sich danach aufzulehnen. Wir haben das Prozedere bereits so lange wir konnten verzögert, aber nun sind wir verpflichtet, diese Fälle an Euch weiterzuleiten."
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Wir haben das Prozedere bereits so lange wir konnten verzögert, aber nun sind wir verpflichtet, diese Fälle an Euch weiterzuleiten."

languages.text: « L'Administratum statue en effet sur d'innombrables affaires, mais un nombre infime d'entre elles surpassent notre capacité à les traiter. Comme le prévoit notre alliance séculaire avec votre dynastie, tout litige susceptible d'avoir des conséquences importantes, quelle que soit la décision finale, doit être examiné sans exception par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Seule votre autorité sacrée peut contraindre les parties à accepter le verdict sans se révolter. Nous avons retardé la procédure aussi longtemps que nous le pouvions, mais nous sommes à présent dans l'obligation de vous confier ces dossiers. »
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."

traits.locale_text: « L'Administratum statue en effet sur d'innombrables affaires, mais un nombre infime d'entre elles surpassent notre capacité à les traiter. Comme le prévoit notre alliance séculaire avec votre dynastie, tout litige susceptible d'avoir des conséquences importantes, quelle que soit la décision finale, doit être examiné sans exception par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Seule votre autorité sacrée peut contraindre les parties à accepter le verdict sans se révolter. Nous avons retardé la procédure aussi longtemps que nous le pouvions, mais nous sommes à présent dans l'obligation de vous confier ces dossiers. »

languages.text: «Es cierto que por el Administratum pasan un sinfín de casos, pero hay una diminuta minoría que está más allá de nuestro poder. Como estipula nuestro pacto con su dinastía desde hace siglos, la decisión final debe ser evaluada por el Comerciante Independiente de turno, sin excepciones. Solo su sagrada autoridad puede obligar a las partes a aceptar el veredicto sin sublevarse como respuesta. Ya hemos pospuesto el procedimiento todo lo posible, pero ahora nos vemos obligados a cederle los casos».
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto que por el Administratum pasan un sinfín de casos, pero hay una diminuta minoría que está más allá de nuestro poder. Ya hemos pospuesto el procedimiento todo lo posible, pero ahora nos vemos obligados a cederle los casos».

languages.text: “确实有许多案件是通过内政部进行裁决的，但其中极少数案件超出了我们的处理范围。根据内政部与您的王朝长达几百年之久的契约，所有可能会造成严重后果的纠纷，无论最终结果如何，都需要行商浪人本人亲自进行审核，无一例外。只有您神圣的权威，才能迫使当事人接受判决结果，避免造成暴乱。我们已经尽可能地推迟了这些案件的审理，但现在，我们有义务将这些案件移交给您。”
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. As stipulated by our centuries-long covenant with your dynasty, any disputes that are likely to have truly grave consequences regardless of the final decision made are to be reviewed without exception by the Rogue Trader. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."

“确实有许多案件是通过内政部进行裁决的，但其中极少数案件超出了我们的处理范围。根据内政部与您的王朝长达几百年之久的契约，所有可能会造成严重后果的纠纷，无论最终结果如何，都需要行商浪人本人亲自进行审核，无一例外。只有您神圣的权威，才能迫使当事人接受判决结果，避免造成暴乱。我们已经尽可能地推迟了这些案件的审理，但现在，我们有义务将这些案件移交给您。”

languages.text: "Administratum'a sayısız dava atanır ancak bunların çok azı bizim işleme yetkimizi aşar. Hanedanlığınızla yüzyıllardır süren andımızda belirtildiği üzere nihai karar ne olursa olsun, gerçekten ciddi sonuçlar doğurabilecek tüm anlaşmazlıkların istisnasız olarak Hür Tacir tarafından incelenmesi gerekmektedir. Yalnızca sizin kutsal otoriteniz, tarafları kararı kabul etmeye ve tepki olarak ayaklanmamaya zorlayabilir. Davayı elimizden geldiğince geciktirdik ancak artık size devretmekle mükellefiz."
languages.original_text: "Countless cases do indeed pass through the Administratum, but a very minute number of them are beyond our power to process. Only your sacred authority can force the parties to accept the verdict and not rise up in response. We have already delayed the proceedings for as long as we could, but now, we are obligated to pass these cases over to you."
